document_data.name: Lance of Faerûn
document_data.mainbody: A '''''lance of Faerûn''''' was a magical [[lance]] with powers of slaying evil and enhanced mounted combat.
document_data.Description: The lances were made from hardwood with a steel tip. They were mostly [[heavy lance]]s designed for [[human]] use, but one in ten was a [[light lance]] for [[halfling]]s or [[gnome]]s.
document_data.Powers: It was ''+2 [[Holy (weapon quality)|holy]] lance''. If used by a follower of Torm, it was also a [[Bane (property)|''bane'']] against [[evil]] [[outsider]]s. Regardless of the faith, the lance allowed the user to make a spirited charge when mounted.
document_data.History: Although ''lances of Faerûn'' were originally created for followers of [[Torm]] who used mounts, a number came to be used by followers of other [[good]] knightly orders.
